text: The 2004 FIA GT Monza 500 km was the first round the 2004 FIA GT Championship season. It took place at the Autodromo Nazionale Monza, Italy, on March 28, 2004. ==Official results== Class winners in bold. ==Statistics== * Pole position – #2 BMS Scuderia Italia – 1:43.509 * Fastest lap – #5 Vitaphone Racing Team – 1:44.708 * Race winner average speed – 189.060 km/h ==References== * * * M Monza 500
